verses.text: Later, \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* \w held|strong="H5648"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w feast|strong="H3900"\w* \w for|strong="H6903"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand \w of|strong="H4430"\w* his \w nobles|strong="H7261"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H6903"\w* \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w* \w with|strong="H5648"\w* them.

\w Under|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* influence \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* gave orders \w to|strong="H5312"\w* bring \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* father \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w taken|strong="H5312"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w temple|strong="H1965"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w could|strong="H1768"\w* \w drink|strong="H8355"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* them, along with \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w nobles|strong="H7261"\w*, \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w wives|strong="H7695"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w concubines|strong="H3904"\w*.

Thus \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w brought|strong="H5312"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* been \w taken|strong="H5312"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w*, \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* them, along with \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w nobles|strong="H7261"\w*, \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w wives|strong="H7695"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w concubines|strong="H3904"\w*.

As they \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* \w the|strong="H7624"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, they \w praised|strong="H7624"\w* their gods of \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, \w bronze|strong="H5174"\w* \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, wood \w and|strong="H6523"\w* stone.

\w At|strong="H6903"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* moment \w the|strong="H5922"\w* fingers \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* human \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w appeared|strong="H5312"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w plaster|strong="H1528"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w wall|strong="H3797"\w*, near \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w lampstand|strong="H5043"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* \w palace|strong="H1965"\w*. \w As|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* watched \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w writing|strong="H3790"\w*,

his \w face|strong="H2122"\w* \w grew|strong="H8133"\w* \w pale|strong="H8133"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* his \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* so alarmed him \w that|strong="H4430"\w* his hips gave way \w and|strong="H4430"\w* his knees knocked \w together|strong="H1668"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w called|strong="H7123"\w* \w out|strong="H1505"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* enchanters, astrologers, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w diviners|strong="H1505"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* be \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* Babylon, “Whoever reads \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w inscription|strong="H3792"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* tells \w me|strong="H5922"\w* \w its|strong="H6591"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* be \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* purple \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w have|strong="H7981"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w chain|strong="H2002"\w* placed \w around|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* be \w made|strong="H7123"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w third|strong="H8523"\w* highest \w ruler|strong="H7981"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.”

So \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*’s \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w came|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w*, \w but|strong="H3606"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w could|strong="H3546"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w inscription|strong="H3792"\w* \w or|strong="H3809"\w* interpret it \w for|strong="H3046"\w* him.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* became even \w more|strong="H5922"\w* terrified, \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w face|strong="H2122"\w* \w grew|strong="H8133"\w* even \w more|strong="H5922"\w* \w pale|strong="H8133"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w nobles|strong="H7261"\w* \w were|strong="H7261"\w* bewildered.

Hearing \w the|strong="H6903"\w* outcry \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H6903"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w his|strong="H5954"\w* \w nobles|strong="H7261"\w*, \w the|strong="H6903"\w* \w queen|strong="H4433"\w* \w entered|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H6903"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4961"\w* \w hall|strong="H1005"\w*. “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, may \w you|strong="H6903"\w* \w live|strong="H2418"\w* \w forever|strong="H5957"\w*!” \w she|strong="H4433"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w*. “Do not let your \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* terrify \w you|strong="H6903"\w*, \w or|strong="H4430"\w* your \w face|strong="H2122"\w* grow \w pale|strong="H8133"\w*.

\w There|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1400"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* gods \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*. \w In|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w days|strong="H3118"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* father \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w have|strong="H5020"\w* \w insight|strong="H7924"\w*, intelligence, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* like \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* gods. \w Your|strong="H1768"\w* father, \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w appointed|strong="H6966"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w* \w chief|strong="H7229"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w magicians|strong="H2749"\w*, enchanters, astrologers, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w diviners|strong="H1505"\w*. \w Your|strong="H1768"\w* own father, \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*,

did \w this|strong="H3606"\w* \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* one \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w named|strong="H8036"\w* \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w*, \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w to|strong="H8271"\w* \w have|strong="H7761"\w* \w an|strong="H4430"\w* \w extraordinary|strong="H3493"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w*, \w as|strong="H3606"\w* well \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H4486"\w*, \w understanding|strong="H7924"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* ability \w to|strong="H8271"\w* interpret \w dreams|strong="H2493"\w*, explain riddles, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w solve|strong="H8271"\w* \w difficult|strong="H7001"\w* \w problems|strong="H7001"\w*. \w Summon|strong="H7123"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3606"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w give|strong="H7761"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* asked \w him|strong="H4481"\w*, “\w Are|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, one \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1123"\w* \w my|strong="H4430"\w* father \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*?

\w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* gods \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w and|strong="H2452"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w insight|strong="H7924"\w*, intelligence, \w and|strong="H2452"\w* \w extraordinary|strong="H3493"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w and|strong="H3792"\w* enchanters \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w inscription|strong="H3792"\w* \w and|strong="H3792"\w* interpret \w it|strong="H2324"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w*, \w but|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w could|strong="H3546"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* give \w its|strong="H6591"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H7981"\w* \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* \w about|strong="H5922"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w able|strong="H3202"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w give|strong="H6590"\w* \w interpretations|strong="H6590"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w solve|strong="H8271"\w* \w difficult|strong="H7001"\w* \w problems|strong="H7001"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H5922"\w*, \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w can|strong="H3202"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w this|strong="H5922"\w* \w inscription|strong="H3792"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w give|strong="H6590"\w* \w me|strong="H5922"\w* \w its|strong="H6591"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*, \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* purple \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w have|strong="H7981"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w chain|strong="H2002"\w* placed \w around|strong="H5922"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w third|strong="H8531"\w* highest \w ruler|strong="H7981"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.”

\w In|strong="H4430"\w* response, \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, “You may keep \w your|strong="H3052"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4978"\w* \w for|strong="H3046"\w* yourself \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w give|strong="H3052"\w* \w your|strong="H3052"\w* \w rewards|strong="H5023"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* someone else. \w Nevertheless|strong="H1297"\w*, I \w will|strong="H4430"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w inscription|strong="H3792"\w* \w for|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* interpret \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w for|strong="H3046"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*.

\w As|strong="H4437"\w* for you, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w Most|strong="H5943"\w* \w High|strong="H5943"\w* God \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w your|strong="H3052"\w* father \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w sovereignty|strong="H4437"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w greatness|strong="H7238"\w*, \w glory|strong="H3367"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w honor|strong="H3367"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H4481"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w greatness|strong="H7238"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w bestowed|strong="H3052"\w* on \w him|strong="H4481"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w every|strong="H3606"\w* nation \w and|strong="H1763"\w* \w language|strong="H3961"\w* \w trembled|strong="H1934"\w* \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w fear|strong="H1763"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w*. \w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w killed|strong="H6992"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w wished|strong="H6634"\w* \w and|strong="H1763"\w* \w kept|strong="H1934"\w* \w alive|strong="H2418"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w wished|strong="H6634"\w*; \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7313"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w wished|strong="H6634"\w* \w and|strong="H1763"\w* \w humbled|strong="H8214"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w wished|strong="H6634"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* \w became|strong="H8631"\w* arrogant \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w was|strong="H3825"\w* \w hardened|strong="H8631"\w* with \w pride|strong="H2103"\w*, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H3825"\w* \w deposed|strong="H5182"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w royal|strong="H4437"\w* \w throne|strong="H3764"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w glory|strong="H3367"\w* \w was|strong="H3825"\w* \w taken|strong="H5709"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w*.
